languages.text: "Кажется, ты начинаешь поддаваться дрессировке, Вольный Торговец... кто знает — может быть, я приберегу тебя после того, как все закончится. Двору нового архонта будут нужны именитые развлечения".
"It looks like you are starting to respond to the training, Rogue Trader... Who knows, I might keep you after everything is over. The new Archon's court will be in need of illustrious entertainment."
languages.original_text: "Кажется, ты начинаешь поддаваться дрессировке, Вольный Торговец... кто знает — может быть, я приберегу тебя после того, как все закончится. Двору нового архонта будут нужны именитые развлечения".

traits.locale_text: "It looks like you are starting to respond to the training, Rogue Trader... Who knows, I might keep you after everything is over. The new archon's court will have a need of eminent entertainment."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: « Il semblerait que votre entraînement commence à porter ses fruits, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... Qui sait, je vous garderai peut-être une fois que tout sera terminé. La cour du nouvel archonte aura grand besoin d'un solide divertissement. »
languages.original_text: "It looks like you are starting to respond to the training, Rogue Trader... Who knows, I might keep you after everything is over. The new Archon's court will be in need of illustrious entertainment."

traits.locale_text: « Il semblerait que votre entraînement commence à porter ses fruits, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... Qui sait, je vous garderai peut-être une fois que tout sera terminé. La cour du nouvel archonte aura grand besoin d'un solide divertissement. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: “看起来我的调教已经有了效果，行商浪人……谁知道呢，或许等这一切结束之后，我会把你留在身边。毕竟，新任执政官的朝廷需要不同凡响的娱乐活动。”
languages.original_text: "It looks like you are starting to respond to the training, Rogue Trader... Who knows, I might keep you after everything is over. The new Archon's court will be in need of illustrious entertainment."

traits.locale_text: “看起来我的调教已经有了效果，行商浪人……谁知道呢，或许等这一切结束之后，我会把你留在身边。毕竟，新任执政官的朝廷需要不同凡响的娱乐活动。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、訓練の影響が出始めているようだな…。すべてが終わった後も、お前を手元に置いておいてもいいかもしれんな。アーコンの新しい宮廷では、華やかな見世物が必要になるだろうからな」
languages.original_text: "It looks like you are starting to respond to the training, Rogue Trader... Who knows, I might keep you after everything is over. The new Archon's court will be in need of illustrious entertainment."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ、訓練の影響が出始めているようだな…。すべてが終わった後も、お前を手元に置いておいてもいいかもしれんな。アーコンの新しい宮廷では、華やかな見世物が必要になるだろうからな」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Es scheint, als würdet Ihr auf Euer Training ansprechen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... Mal sehen, vielleicht behalte ich Euch ja, wenn alles vorbei ist. Der Hof des neuen Archons wird etwas illustre Unterhaltung brauchen."
languages.original_text: "It looks like you are starting to respond to the training, Rogue Trader... Who knows, I might keep you after everything is over. The new Archon's court will be in need of illustrious entertainment."

traits.locale_text: "Es scheint, als würdet Ihr auf Euer Training ansprechen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... Mal sehen, vielleicht behalte ich Euch ja, wenn alles vorbei ist. Auch der Hof des neuen Archons wird etwas Unterhaltung brauchen."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: «Parece que empiezas a responder al condicionamiento, Comerciante Independiente... Quién sabe, igual me quedo contigo cuando todo esto acabe. La corte del nuevo arconte necesitará un divertimento ilustre».
languages.original_text: "It looks like you are starting to respond to the training, Rogue Trader... Who knows, I might keep you after everything is over. The new Archon's court will be in need of illustrious entertainment."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que empiezas a responder al condicionamiento, Comerciante Independiente... Quién sabe, igual me quedo contigo cuando todo esto acabe. La corte del nuevo arconte necesitará un divertimento apropiado».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Nihayet eğitime karşılık vermeye başlıyorsun Hür Tacir. Kim bilir... Belki işimizi bittiğinde canını bağışlarım. Yeni Arkon'un sarayında da eğlence gerekli olacak sonuçta."
languages.original_text: "It looks like you are starting to respond to the training, Rogue Trader... Who knows, I might keep you after everything is over. The new Archon's court will be in need of illustrious entertainment."

traits.locale_text: "Görünüşe göre nihayet eğitime yanıt vermeye başlıyorsun Hür Tacir. Kim bilir, belki her şey sona erdiğinde seni öldürmem bile. Yeni Arkon'un sarayında da eğlence gerekli olacak sonuçta."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
